description:
In this course you'll learn important concepts of User eXperience and introduce you to many powerful UX tools and techniques.

Focusing on user experience (UX) can differentiate a company from its competitors. In this course, you'll get a thorough overview of the user experience field and its many components. You will learn the importance of a user-centered design process and the benefit of incorporating UX activities at every stage of a project.

This course will help you understand people's online behavior that gives you insight into designs that work and don't work. Discover the most important guidelines for making your website easier and more enjoyable to use. Then learn to apply these usability principles to design challenges to create products that benefit the business and users.
title: User Experience (UX) Design Essentials for Websites
